WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Position_Future_Payment_Plan_Assignment_.description: The employee to whom the set of future payment plan assignments are assigned to or will be assigned to.

Position_ElementObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Position_Future_Payment_Plan_Assignment_.description: The position to whom the set of future payment plan assignments are assigned to or will be assigned to.

validation.validation: Position submitted is not filled as of the effective date.
The employee you have selected has more than one job. You must supply the job to which this operation applies.
The job is not valid for the employee.

Position_Future_Payment_Plan_Assignment_.description: Assignment date for the future payment plan assignment.

Future_Payment_PlanObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Position_Future_Payment_Plan_Assignment_.description: Future payment plan assignment data submitted by the put future payment plan assignment request.

validation.validation: Individual Target Amount has to be greater than zero. If you do not wish to use Individual Target Amount, leave the field blank.

description: The position the set of future payment plan assignments will be assigned to.
